articles.title: Australia on the verge of qualification - FIFA
articles.summary: Jordan and Uzbekistan earn maiden qualification, Australia on cusp Jordan and Uzbekistan reach first finals while Korea Republic also punch ticket and Australia move to the brink of qualification. Jordan and Uzbekistan have reached their first FIFA World Cup™. An Ali Olwan hat-trick piloted the former to a 3-0 win over Oman, while the latter drew with United Arab Emirates.
